40 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Reveals the Real Reason He Walks Away From Trump Read More Ads by Ad.Style 0illuminated1 36 points 4 days ago The fact that law is selectively enforced should be all the proof you need that it's fake and gay. Thank you. permalink parent award report block reply 0illuminated1 8 points 4 days ago Among a group of friends, people don’t play political games with each other. The minute someone does, you know they’re no longer really a friend. Good people don’t want to exert control over others, so by that logic, politicians, by definition, aren’t good people. The only thing they are good at is making and bending rules to suit their own interests... and also being full of shit. When I was a kid, everyone knew politicians were completely fake and gay.  It seems that through the facade of elections they can bring people back into thinking It's real.. ...Somehow they keep people believing it's real... The easiest ones to fool are the ones who desperately want to believe..  its too much for most people to accept It's all fake and gay...that they are little more than cattle...
